android.car.app

类 CarActivityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.app.CarActivityManager

  • public final class CarActivityManager
extends CarManagerBase
    API to manage android.app.Activity in Car.

    • 嵌套类概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int ERROR_CODE_ACTIVITY_NOT_FOUND
      Internal error code for throwing ActivityNotFoundException from service.
      static int RESULT_FAILURE
      Indicates that the operation was failed with the unknown reason.
      static int RESULT_INVALID_USER
      Indicates that the operation was failed because the requester isn't the current user or the system user
      static int RESULT_SUCCESS
      Indicates that the operation was successful.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setPersistentActivity

        public int setPersistentActivity(ComponentName activity,
                                 int displayId,
                                 int featureId)
        Designates the given activity to be launched in TaskDisplayArea of featureId in the display of displayId.

        Note: this will not affect the existing Activity. Note: You can map assign Activity to one TaskDisplayArea only. If you assign it to the multiple TaskDisplayAreas, then the last one wins. Note: The requester should be the current user or the system user, if not, the operation will be failed with RESULT_INVALID_USER.

        参数:
        activity - Activity to designate
        displayId - Display where TaskDisplayArea is located in
        featureId - TaskDisplayArea where Activity is launched in, if it is DisplayAreaOrganizer.FEATURE_UNDEFINED, then it'll remove the existing one.
        返回:
        ResultTypeEnum. RESULT_SUCCESS if the operation is successful, otherwise, RESULT_XXX depending on the type of the error.
        抛出:
        {@link - IllegalArgumentException} if displayId or featureId is invalid. ActivityNotFoundException if activity is not found when it tries to remove.

      • setPersistentActivitiesOnRootTask

        public void setPersistentActivitiesOnRootTask(java.util.List<ComponentName> activities,
                                              IBinder rootTaskToken)
        Designates the given activities to be launched in the root task associated with the given rootTaskToken.

        Note: If an activity is already persisted on a root task, it will be overridden by the rootTaskToken supplied in the latest call.

        Note: If rootTaskToken is null, the designation will be removed and the given activities will follow default behavior.

        参数:
        activities - list of ComponentName of activities to be designated on the root task.
        rootTaskToken - the binder token of the root task.

      • onCarDisconnected

        protected void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • registerTaskMonitor

        public boolean registerTaskMonitor()
        Registers the caller as TaskMonitor, which can provide Task lifecycle events to CarService. The caller should provide a binder token, which is used to check if the given TaskMonitor is live and the reported events are from the legitimate TaskMonitor.

      • onTaskAppeared

        @Deprecated
public void onTaskAppeared(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo taskInfo)
        已过时。 Use onTaskAppeared(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo, SurfaceControl)
        Reports that a Task is created.

      • onTaskAppeared

        public void onTaskAppeared(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo taskInfo,
                           SurfaceControl leash)
        Reports that a Task is created.

      • onTaskVanished

        public void onTaskVanished(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo taskInfo)
        Reports that a Task is vanished.

      • onTaskInfoChanged

        public void onTaskInfoChanged(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo taskInfo)
        Reports that some Task's states are changed.

      • unregisterTaskMonitor

        public void unregisterTaskMonitor()
        Unregisters the caller from TaskMonitor.

      • getVisibleTasks

        public java.util.List<ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo> getVisibleTasks()
        Returns all the visible tasks in the all displays. The order is not guaranteed.

      • getVisibleTasks

        public java.util.List<ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo> getVisibleTasks(int displayId)
        Returns all the visible tasks in the given display. The order is not guaranteed.
        参数:
        displayId - the id of Display to retrieve the tasks, Display.INVALID_DISPLAY to retrieve the tasks in the all displays.

      • startUserPickerOnDisplay

        public void startUserPickerOnDisplay(int displayId)
        Starts user picker UI (=user selection UI) to the given display.

        User picker UI will run as android.os.UserHandle#SYSTEM user.

      • createTaskMirroringToken

        public IBinder createTaskMirroringToken(int taskId)
        Creates the mirroring token of the given Task.
        参数:
        taskId - The Task to mirror.
        返回:
        A token to access the Task Surface. The token is used to identify the target Task's Surface for MirroredSurfaceView.

      • createDisplayMirroringToken

        public IBinder createDisplayMirroringToken(int displayId)
        Creates the mirroring token of the given Display.
        参数:
        displayId - The Display to mirror.
        返回:
        A token to access the Display Surface. The token is used to identify the target Display's Surface for MirroredSurfaceView.

      • getMirroredSurface

        public <any> getMirroredSurface(IBinder token)
        Gets a mirrored SurfaceControl of the Task identified by the given Token.
        参数:
        token - The token to access the Surface.
        返回:
        A Pair of SurfaceControl and the bounds of the mirrored Task, or {code null} if it can't find the target Surface to mirror.

      • registerCarSystemUIProxy

        public void registerCarSystemUIProxy(CarSystemUIProxy carSystemUIProxy)
        Registers a system ui proxy which will be used by the client apps to interact with the system-ui for things like creating task views, getting notified about immersive mode request, etc.

        This is meant to be called only by the SystemUI.

        参数:
        carSystemUIProxy - the implementation of the CarSystemUIProxy.
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - when called more than once for the same SystemUi process.

      • isCarSystemUIProxyRegistered

        public boolean isCarSystemUIProxyRegistered()
        Returns true if the CarSystemUIProxy is registered, false otherwise.

      • getCarTaskViewController

        public void getCarTaskViewController(Activity hostActivity,
                                     java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor,
                                     CarTaskViewControllerCallback carTaskViewControllerCallback)
        Gets the CarTaskViewController using the carTaskViewControllerCallback. This method is expected to be called from the Activity#onCreate(Bundle). It will take care of freeing up the held resources when activity is destroyed. If an activity is recreated, it should be called again in the next Activity#onCreate(Bundle).
        参数:
        carTaskViewControllerCallback - the callback which the client can use to monitor the lifecycle of the CarTaskViewController.
        hostActivity - the activity that will host the taskviews.

      • getCarTaskViewController

        public void getCarTaskViewController(Context hostContext,
                                     CarTaskViewControllerHostLifecycle carTaskViewControllerHostLifecycle,
                                     java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor,
                                     CarTaskViewControllerCallback carTaskViewControllerCallback)
        Gets the CarTaskViewController using the carTaskViewControllerCallback. This method is expected to be called when the container (host) is created. It will take care of freeing up the held resources when container is destroyed. If the container is recreated, this method should be called again after it gets created again.
        参数:
        carTaskViewControllerCallback - the callback which the client can use to monitor the lifecycle of the CarTaskViewController.
        hostContext - the visual hostContext which the container (host) is associated with.
        callbackExecutor - the executor which the carTaskViewControllerCallback will be executed on.
        carTaskViewControllerHostLifecycle - the lifecycle of the container (host).

      • moveRootTaskToDisplay

        public void moveRootTaskToDisplay(int taskId,
                                  int displayId)
        Moves the given RootTask with its child Activties to the specified Display.
        参数:
        taskId - the id of the target RootTask to move
        displayId - the displayId to move the RootTask to
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given taskId or displayId is invalid
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given RootTask is already in the given Display Note: the operation can be failed if the given Display doesn't allow for the type of the given RootTask to be launched.
